post:
WebHorizon has been providing web hosting and VPS services since 2019.
We aim for 100% customer satisfaction & 24 hours money-back policy.  :)

<br>

Location - Tokyo, Japan (Equinix TY8) - [Looking Glass](http://tyo.lg.webhorizon.in/ "Looking Glass")

<br>

================
**VPS-VZ 256MB Japan**

================
256MB ECC RAM
1 CPU Core(s)
5 GB NVMe/SSD Disk
1 IPv4 + /64 IPv6
200 GB Premium Bandwidth @ 1 Gbps per month

**$10.56 / YEAR** ~ USD $0.88 per month = [**Order Link**](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/config/index/ovz/?group_id=48&pricing_id=506&coupon=Japan-prelaunch "Order Link")

<br>

> **See all higher plans** > https://my.webhorizon.in/order/main/packages/ovz/?group_id=48
> Limited coupon = Japan-prelaunch - 15 uses left.

✔️ Premium Bandwidth
✔️ Pure NVMe/SSD disks
✔️ Free Backup / Snapshot options in panel (best-effort)
✔️ Full Gbps ports


## Activation time = Instantly (please turn OFF VPN while order)

<br>

> FAQ


**Docker Support** - Yes Docker is Supported

**Tun / Tap / Fuse** - Yes Supported

**Invalid hostname** - Our system expects hostname in domain format, it needs not to be an actual domain.
example - mydomain.com

 
**Support Available via** - [Support Helpdesk](https://my.webhorizon.in/plugin/support_manager/client_tickets/departments/ "Support Helpdesk") , [Telegram](https://t.me/WebHorizon "Telegram")

<br>

> Available payment methods 

Crypto, CC via Stripe, PayPal, etc.
Also BTC, BCH & XMR payments are supported.

<br>

Feel free to ask any questions you might have :)

Thanks!
